name: Stroop Stooped
description:
Hello and thanks for playing!

Music by SkyeWint:

https://skyewint.bandcamp.com/
https://soundcloud.com/swint-1

Besides the music, the rest of the game was developed by just me and I am very proud of that (this is my first game jam)!

In psychology, the Stroop effect is a demonstration of cognitive interference where a delay in the reaction time of a task occurs due to a mismatch in stimuli.

In other words, this game is literally making your brain lie to itself.

Might start posting some gaming content to youtube as a hobby, finally picked up some basic equipment. https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCq1sxhGzh32GP3hx5KcJ76w
